Our Learning Strategy

Learning Methodology

At Level Up College, we believe in participatory, experiential, and reflective learning to empower students as active learners and change-makers. Our methodology is designed to blend theory with practice, ensuring students gain both knowledge and hands-on experience.

Our goal is to create a dynamic learning environment where students not only acquire academic knowledge but also develop the leadership, problem-solving, and teamwork skills needed to drive positive change in their communities.

Community Engagement

Practical
Experiences

Academic Study

Interactive Classes

Engaging lectures, group discussions, and cross-cultural communication activities to foster critical thinking and collaboration.

Project-Based Learning

Students work on real-world projects, from community development plans to social entrepreneurship initiatives, applying their skills in practical settings.

Service Learning

Through community engagement and internships, students gain firsthand experience working with local organizations and addressing community needs.

Internship Program

Students participate in community-based and organizational internships, gaining practical experience in development sectors, leadership, and project management.

Research & Fieldwork

Students conduct surveys, interviews, and field observations, learning to analyze data and communicate findings effectively.

Guest Speakers & Workshops

Regular sessions with industry experts and community leaders provide insights into current trends and challenges in social development.

Level Up College

Level Up College is a community-based, non-profit higher education institution empowering youth from diverse backgrounds, especially those from marginalized communities and conflict-affected areas in Kayah (Karenni) State and the nearby region..
